|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS32M16DS-5T; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 60:A4:4C,AC:22:0B |oui = 60:A4:4C,AC:22:0B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan, OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2016 |fccapprovdate = 05/10/2013 |estreldate = 04/22/2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = 886227372317 |newegg = |asin = B00C7FC3BA |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"1242-01000343-50Z" is silkscreened on the board. Per the FCC photos... :The device is using [[MediaTek MT7620N]] WiSoC :Flash: 16MB ''Winbond'' W25Q128FVSG (25Q128FVSG) :RAM: 64MB ''Nanya'' NT5DS32M16DS (NT5DS32M16DS-5T) *The MT7620N SoC is clocked @ 580/600/620 MHz. :Default settings are per ''ASUS'''s manual. *[http://www.MediaTek.com/_en/03_news/01-2_newsDetail.php?sn=1083 MediaTek press release about this device] *This device was noted to use a MT7620 WiSoC :MT7620 family integrates 2T2R 802.11n, CPU 600MHz :MIPS 24K, 5xFE switch, 2xRGMII, USB, PCIe, SDHC PR :MT7620N will support eCos and Linux for entry level :11n 2.4GHz router and go mass production in Q3 2012 PR ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.asus.com/News/tfmb9PejCp4hXQRL Asus News] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/134-asus-rt-n14u.html ''ASUS RT-N14U'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] :60:A4:4C OUI ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:58757 ''RTN'''s thread about the device on '''iXBT''' forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-n14u_c1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-n14u |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
J2 - 3.3V, RX, GND, TX
:Pin 1 marked with the corner/box :Baud rate is 57600 ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' Image:ASUS_RT-N14U_top.jpg|board top Image:ASUS_RT-N14U_bot.jpg|board bottom
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] ====Wireless Router==== * [[ASUS RT-N54U]] N600 (600Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN54U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ Product Page] ====Wireless Range Extender==== * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (600Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] [[Category:English Documentation]]
